Articles.Content:
Well, I was browsing on Kickstarter, looking for anything new and interesting that I might help along, when I found this little jewel...

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/intermarum/race-to-mars

Basically, the premise of the game is "You are the CEO of a NewSpace company". You will get to create missions, research technologies to give you an edge over your competitors, accept contracts from various sources, develop spaceframes, all with the end-goal of colonizing Mars. So, basically you get to be Elon Musk. It's about a fifth of the way to being funded with 21 days left to go. What do you all think?

Wow! I really hope this game gets made. It should be really good for KSP players who want a bit more time on the administrative side of things. Fellow players on steam, go greenlight this game as well!

We need to get this big in the forums! If we could get the full force of the KSP community involved who know what might happen!

I need this game!

We need to get this big in the forums! If we could get the full force of the KSP community involved who know what might happen!

I need this game!

Then let people know about it!

Some of the game devs have posted already in the other thread about this, down in the junkyard.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/38199-Race-to-Mars-Kickstarter-is-now-live

But I agree, the more attention the better, even if we do end up with multiple threads.

Hi guys

Ask anything if you have some questions

It's in the right section.

Tis not, however, the section I posted this in.
